source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 469,216 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 251,086.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cowl of the Swift Fox

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: When you enter combat, gain 1 Dormant Gemstone per socketed gem.

Whenever you heal an ally, bestow upon them 1 Empowered Gemstone to increase the potency of one of their socketed gems by 141 for 20 sec. When their gemstone becomes dormant, it is returned to you.

Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Gloves of the Swift Fox

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 81 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 8,150 to 9,961 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 302 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,934 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 209 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Obsidian Wings of Awakening

spells.description: Use: Zap yourself for 302,065 Nature damage, gaining 19,664 Intellect for 15 sec. (45 Sec Cooldown)
